The stomach ache business was brought up when the Shinsengumi were
under the command of Serizawa Kamo.  Everyone went on a boat trip,
Saitou got sick they went to stay at an inn and called a doctor for
him and later the group got into a "scuffle" with sumo wrestlers. 
However, I skimmed Burai, and the situation outlined was not the one I
just mentioned...the author used it as an excuse to have Okita spoil
him (not in -that- way you sickos)...at least I didn't catch anything
controversial:)  

Source:http://victorian.fortunecity.com/stanford/130/bio.html
you can search for Saitou by just using the EDIT button and type in
"Saitou" to find references to him on the pages

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <mg_batt@y...> wrote:
> Hmmm... Makes me think twice if they make such a big deal of his 
> stomach ache...
